summary: Okralord's Obsidian Weapons and Armor v1.0 adds a great alternative to the weird looking Stalhrim weapons and armor. Obsidian armor and weapons are equal to Stalhrim in their attributes, but look way cooler! With a fantastic rainbow sheen, they look like real life obsidian! Looks great on warriors, spellswords, nightblades, anyone!
descriptionHtml:
[center]==============================================
    Obsidian Weapons and Armor Version 1.0
 by Okralord
[url=http://okraplutonium.x10.mx]OkraPlutonium.x10.mx[/url]
==============================================
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/63286-1-1430177347.png[/img][/center]

 Thanks for checking out my second ever mod! As I'm writing this I haven't released my Rune Weapons and Armor mod
which would be my first official one. Anyway, please enjoy this mod and if you have questions be sure to ask them!!

[youtube]viZSpM6WQIE[/youtube]

 Okralord's Obsidian Weapons and Armor adds a great alternative to the weird looking Stalhrim weapons and armor. Obsidian armor and weapons are equal to Stalhrim in their attributes, but look way cooler! With a fantastic rainbow sheen, they look like real life obsidian! Looks great on warriors, spellswords, nightblades, anyone!

Mod Details:
-Obsidian heavy class armor including helmet, cuirass, bracers, boots, and shield
-Obsidian weapons including, sword, greatsword, war axe, battleaxe, warhammer, bow, and dagger
-Obsidian items are forged using raw ebony ore and firesalts

INSTALLATION:
1. Drag and drop the .BSA and .ESP files into your Skyrim directory
2. Open the Skyrim launcher and make sure the checkbox for ObsidianWaAv1 is checked
3. Launch Skyrim and Enjoy!!!

REQUIREMENTS:
Dragonborn DLC

NOTES:
 If you are unable to find the obsidian weapons or armor, remember that your character needs to have completed the 
Stalhrim quest on Solstheim (this is why it requires the DragonBorn DLC) AND have the perk ability to forge ebony armor before they will even show up in the crafting menu of the forge. This really is an alternative to the Stalhrim weapons and armor which is usually unlocked
later in the game.

CHANGELOG:
-V1.0 Initial release
-V1.1 Renamed the .bsa and .esp to match because I guess that's important lol

[center]+===========================================================================================================+
If you enoyed my mod, let me know by endorsing it!
[url=http://OkraPlutonium.x10.mx]OkraPlutonium.x10.mx[/url]
+===========================================================================================================+[/center]
author: Okralord
